skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hauper technologies
des:
We at Hauper, are here to help you to provide solutions to enhance your E-Business.

Over the last 5 years, we take pride to have designed, developed and maintained a wide range of end to end websites and Mobile Application including high-end E-Commerce websites for large business organizations as well as web and mobile applications for start-up companies.

We have extensive expertise in building web and mobile application using content management system like Wordpress, Joomla etc, based solutions for domains like hospitality, travel, legal, technology, fashion, publishing, marketing, media to name a few.

We have developed various applications for mobile and tables (for both Android and iPhone), built on both native and frameworks.

By Providing 24*7 support and communication across various medium we are leading into the market and serving various client in various industries across the globe.

We have extensive expertise in:

» Implementing websites using the major PHP platforms like Wordpress, Joomla, Laravel, Zend Cart, Cake PHP, Core PHP, Codeigniter etc.

» WordPress / Joomla programming, Theme customization, Installation, Configuration, Plug-in / modules / components implementation, template design and development.

» We have expertise in mobile application technologies like objective-c, Swift, Cocos2D, XMPP, Android Studio, PhoneGap Etc. We have developed various domains applications.

» HTML5 / CSS3 / jQuery Animated Websites /Photoshop / Illustrator / Logo designing / Banner designing , Angular JS , Node JS ,Twitter Bootstrap and many other technologies for front end & backend development.

» Third party API integration like social media(facebook, twitter, google+), payment method, chat etc.

Use our services today and take your business to next level!!!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
